verses.verse: Then Joshua <S%H3091><s%> gathered <S%H622><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> the tribes <S%H7626><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> to Shechem, <S%H7927><s%> and called <S%H7121><s%> for the elders <S%H2205><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> and for their heads <S%H7218><s%> and their judges <S%H8199><s%> and their officers; <S%H7860><s%> and they presented <S%H3320><s%> themselves before <S%H6440><s%> God. <S%H430><s%>

And Joshua <S%H3091><s%> said <S%H559><s%> to all <S%H3605><s%> the people, <S%H5971><s%> "Thus <S%H3541><s%> says <S%H559><s%> the Lord, <S%H3068><s%> the God <S%H430><s%> of Israel, <S%H3478><s%> 'From ancient <S%H5769><s%> times <S%H5769><s%> your fathers lived <S%H1><s%> beyond <S%H3427><s%> the River, <S%H5676><s%> [namely,] Terah, <S%H5104><s%> the father of Abraham <S%H8646><s%> and the father of Nahor, <S%H1><s%> and they served <S%H85><s%> other <S%H1><s%> gods. <S%H5152><s%>

'Then I took <S%H3947><s%> your father Abraham <S%H1><s%> from beyond <S%H85><s%> <S%H4480><s%> the River, <S%H5676><s%> and led <S%H5104><s%> him through all <S%H1980><s%> the land <S%H3605><s%> of Canaan, <S%H776><s%> and multiplied <S%H3667><s%> his descendants <S%H7235><s%> and gave <S%H2233><s%> him Isaac. <S%H5414><s%>

'And to Isaac <S%H3327><s%> I gave <S%H5414><s%> Jacob <S%H3290><s%> and Esau, <S%H6215><s%> and to Esau <S%H6215><s%> I gave <S%H5414><s%> Mount <S%H2022><s%> Seir, <S%H8165><s%> to possess <S%H3423><s%> it; but Jacob <S%H3290><s%> and his sons <S%H1121><s%> went <S%H3381><s%> down <S%H3381><s%> to Egypt. <S%H4714><s%>

'Then I sent <S%H7971><s%> Moses <S%H4872><s%> and Aaron, <S%H175><s%> and I plagued <S%H5062><s%> Egypt <S%H4714><s%> by what <S%H834><s%> I did <S%H6213><s%> in its midst; <S%H7130><s%> and afterward <S%H310><s%> I brought <S%H3318><s%> you out.

'And I brought <S%H3318><s%> your fathers out of Egypt, <S%H1><s%> and you came <S%H4714><s%> to the sea; <S%H935><s%> and Egypt <S%H3220><s%> pursued <S%H4714><s%> your fathers with chariots <S%H7291><s%> and horsemen <S%H1><s%> to the Red <S%H7393><s%> <S%H6571><s%> Sea. <S%H5488><s%>

'But when they cried <S%H6817><s%> out to the Lord, <S%H3068><s%> He put <S%H7760><s%> darkness <S%H3990><s%> between <S%H996><s%> you and the Egyptians, <S%H4713><s%> and brought <S%H935><s%> the sea <S%H3220><s%> upon them and covered <S%H3680><s%> them; and your own eyes <S%H5869><s%> saw <S%H7200><s%> what <S%H834><s%> I did <S%H6213><s%> in Egypt. <S%H4714><s%> And you lived <S%H3427><s%> in the wilderness <S%H4057><s%> for a long <S%H7227><s%> time. <S%H3117><s%>

'Then I brought <S%H935><s%> you into the land <S%H776><s%> of the Amorites <S%H567><s%> who lived <S%H3427><s%> beyond <S%H5676><s%> the Jordan, <S%H3383><s%> and they fought <S%H3898><s%> with you; and I gave <S%H5414><s%> them into your hand, <S%H3027><s%> and you took <S%H3423><s%> possession <S%H3423><s%> of their land <S%H776><s%> when I destroyed <S%H8045><s%> them before <S%H6440><s%> you.

'Then Balak <S%H1111><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Zippor, <S%H6834><s%> king <S%H4428><s%> of Moab, <S%H4124><s%> arose <S%H6965><s%> and fought <S%H3898><s%> against Israel, <S%H3478><s%> and he sent <S%H7971><s%> and summoned <S%H7121><s%> Balaam <S%H1109><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Beor <S%H1160><s%> to curse <S%H7043><s%> you.
'But I was not willing <S%H14><s%> to listen <S%H8085><s%> to Balaam. <S%H1109><s%> So he had <S%H1288><s%> to bless <S%H1288><s%> you, and I delivered <S%H5337><s%> you from his hand. <S%H3027><s%>

'And you crossed <S%H5674><s%> the Jordan <S%H3383><s%> and came <S%H935><s%> to Jericho; <S%H3405><s%> and the citizens <S%H1167><s%> of Jericho <S%H3405><s%> fought <S%H3898><s%> against you, [and] the Amorite <S%H567><s%> and the Perizzite <S%H6522><s%> and the Canaanite <S%H3669><s%> and the Hittite <S%H2850><s%> and the Girgashite, <S%H1622><s%> the Hivite <S%H2340><s%> and the Jebusite. <S%H2983><s%> Thus I gave <S%H5414><s%> them into your hand. <S%H3027><s%>

'Then I sent <S%H7971><s%> the hornet <S%H6880><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> you and it drove <S%H1644><s%> out the two <S%H8147><s%> kings <S%H4428><s%> of the Amorites <S%H567><s%> from before <S%H4480><s%> <S%H6440><s%> you, [but] not by your sword <S%H2719><s%> or your bow. <S%H7198><s%>

'And I gave <S%H5414><s%> you a land <S%H776><s%> on which <S%H834><s%> you had not labored, <S%H3021><s%> and cities <S%H5892><s%> which <S%H834><s%> you had not built, <S%H1129><s%> and you have lived <S%H3427><s%> in them; you are eating <S%H398><s%> of vineyards <S%H3754><s%> and olive <S%H2132><s%> groves <S%H2132><s%> which <S%H834><s%> you did not plant. <S%H5193><s%>'

"Now, <S%H6258><s%> therefore, fear <S%H3372><s%> the Lord <S%H3068><s%> and serve <S%H5647><s%> Him in sincerity <S%H8549><s%> and truth; <S%H571><s%> and put <S%H5493><s%> away <S%H5493><s%> the gods <S%H430><s%> which <S%H834><s%> your fathers served <S%H1><s%> beyond <S%H5647><s%> the River <S%H5676><s%> and in Egypt, <S%H5104><s%> and serve <S%H4714><s%> the Lord. <S%H5647><s%>

"And if <S%H518><s%> it is disagreeable <S%H7489><s%> in your sight <S%H5869><s%> to serve <S%H5647><s%> the Lord, <S%H3068><s%> choose <S%H977><s%> for yourselves today <S%H3117><s%> whom <S%H4310><s%> you will serve: <S%H5647><s%> whether <S%H518><s%> the gods <S%H430><s%> which <S%H834><s%> your fathers served <S%H1><s%> which <S%H5647><s%> were beyond <S%H834><s%> the River, <S%H5676><s%> or the gods <S%H5104><s%> of the Amorites <S%H430><s%> in whose <S%H567><s%> land <S%H834><s%> you are living; <S%H776><s%> but as for me and my house, <S%H3427><s%> we will serve <S%H1004><s%> the Lord. <S%H5647><s%>"

And the people <S%H5971><s%> answered <S%H6030><s%> and said, <S%H559><s%> "Far <S%H2486><s%> be it from us that we should forsake <S%H5800><s%> the Lord <S%H3068><s%> to serve <S%H5647><s%> other <S%H312><s%> gods; <S%H430><s%>

for the Lord <S%H3068><s%> our God <S%H430><s%> is He who brought <S%H5927><s%> us and our fathers up out of the land <S%H1><s%> of Egypt, <S%H776><s%> from the house <S%H4714><s%> of bondage, <S%H1004><s%> and who <S%H5650><s%> did <S%H834><s%> these <S%H6213><s%> great <S%H428><s%> signs <S%H1419><s%> in our sight <S%H226><s%> and preserved <S%H5869><s%> us through all <S%H8104><s%> the way <S%H3605><s%> in which <S%H1870><s%> we went <S%H834><s%> and among all <S%H1980><s%> the peoples <S%H3605><s%> through whose <S%H5971><s%> midst <S%H834><s%> we passed. <S%H7130><s%>

"And the Lord <S%H3068><s%> drove <S%H1644><s%> out from before <S%H6440><s%> us all <S%H3605><s%> the peoples, <S%H5971><s%> even the Amorites <S%H567><s%> who lived <S%H3427><s%> in the land. <S%H776><s%> We also <S%H1571><s%> will serve <S%H5647><s%> the Lord, <S%H3068><s%> for He is our God. <S%H430><s%>"

Then Joshua <S%H3091><s%> said <S%H559><s%> to the people, <S%H5971><s%> "You will not be able <S%H3201><s%> to serve <S%H5647><s%> the Lord, <S%H3068><s%> for He is a holy <S%H6918><s%> God. <S%H430><s%> He is a jealous <S%H7072><s%> God; <S%H410><s%> He will not forgive <S%H5375><s%> your transgression <S%H6588><s%> or your sins. <S%H9128><s%>

"If <S%H3588><s%> you forsake <S%H5800><s%> the Lord <S%H3068><s%> and serve <S%H5647><s%> foreign <S%H5236><s%> gods, <S%H430><s%> then He will turn <S%H7725><s%> and do <S%H7489><s%> you harm <S%H7489><s%> and consume <S%H3615><s%> you after <S%H310><s%> He has done <S%H3190><s%> good <S%H3190><s%> to you."
And the people <S%H5971><s%> said <S%H559><s%> to Joshua, <S%H3091><s%> "No, <S%H3808><s%> but we will serve <S%H5647><s%> the Lord. <S%H3068><s%>"

And Joshua <S%H3091><s%> said <S%H559><s%> to the people, <S%H5971><s%> "You are witnesses <S%H5707><s%> against yourselves that you have chosen <S%H977><s%> for yourselves the Lord, <S%H3068><s%> to serve <S%H5647><s%> Him." And they said, <S%H559><s%> "We are witnesses. <S%H5707><s%>"

"Now <S%H6258><s%> therefore, put <S%H5493><s%> away <S%H5493><s%> the foreign <S%H5236><s%> gods <S%H430><s%> which <S%H834><s%> are in your midst, <S%H7130><s%> and incline <S%H5186><s%> your hearts <S%H3824><s%> to the Lord, <S%H3068><s%> the God <S%H430><s%> of Israel. <S%H3478><s%>"

And the people <S%H5971><s%> said <S%H559><s%> to Joshua, <S%H3091><s%> "We will serve <S%H5647><s%> the Lord <S%H3068><s%> our God <S%H430><s%> and we will obey <S%H8085><s%> His voice. <S%H6963><s%>"

So Joshua <S%H3091><s%> made <S%H3772><s%> a covenant <S%H1285><s%> with the people <S%H5971><s%> that day, <S%H3117><s%> and made <S%H7760><s%> for them a statute <S%H2706><s%> and an ordinance <S%H4941><s%> in Shechem. <S%H7927><s%>

And Joshua <S%H3091><s%> wrote <S%H3789><s%> these <S%H428><s%> words <S%H1697><s%> in the book <S%H5612><s%> of the law <S%H8451><s%> of God; <S%H430><s%> and he took <S%H3947><s%> a large <S%H1419><s%> stone <S%H68><s%> and set <S%H6965><s%> it up there <S%H8033><s%> under <S%H8478><s%> the oak <S%H427><s%> that was by the sanctuary <S%H4720><s%> of the Lord. <S%H3068><s%>

And Joshua <S%H3091><s%> said <S%H559><s%> to all <S%H3605><s%> the people, <S%H5971><s%> "Behold, <S%H2009><s%> this <S%H2088><s%> stone <S%H68><s%> shall be for a witness <S%H5713><s%> against us, for it has heard <S%H8085><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> the words <S%H561><s%> of the Lord <S%H3068><s%> which <S%H834><s%> He spoke <S%H1696><s%> to us; thus it shall be for a witness <S%H5713><s%> against you, lest <S%H6435><s%> you deny <S%H3584><s%> your God. <S%H430><s%>"
Then Joshua <S%H3091><s%> dismissed <S%H7971><s%> the people, <S%H5971><s%> each <S%H376><s%> to his inheritance. <S%H5159><s%>

And it came <S%H1961><s%> about after <S%H310><s%> these <S%H428><s%> things <S%H1697><s%> that Joshua <S%H3091><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Nun, <S%H5126><s%> the servant <S%H5650><s%> of the Lord, <S%H3068><s%> died, <S%H4191><s%> being one hundred <S%H3967><s%> and ten <S%H6235><s%> years <S%H8141><s%> old. <S%H1121><s%>

And they buried <S%H6912><s%> him in the territory <S%H1366><s%> of his inheritance <S%H5159><s%> in Timnath-serah, which <S%H834><s%> is in the hill <S%H2022><s%> country <S%H2022><s%> of Ephraim, <S%H669><s%> on the north <S%H6828><s%> of Mount <S%H2022><s%> Gaash. <S%H1608><s%>

And Israel <S%H3478><s%> served <S%H5647><s%> the Lord <S%H3068><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> the days <S%H3117><s%> of Joshua <S%H3091><s%> and all <S%H3605><s%> the days <S%H3117><s%> of the elders <S%H2205><s%> who <S%H834><s%> survived <S%H748><s%> <S%H3117><s%> <S%H310><s%> Joshua, <S%H3091><s%> and had known <S%H3045><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> the deeds <S%H4639><s%> of the Lord <S%H3068><s%> which <S%H834><s%> He had done <S%H6213><s%> for Israel. <S%H3478><s%>

Now they buried <S%H6912><s%> the bones <S%H6106><s%> of Joseph, <S%H3130><s%> which <S%H834><s%> the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> brought <S%H5927><s%> up from Egypt, <S%H4714><s%> at Shechem, <S%H7927><s%> in the piece <S%H2513><s%> of ground <S%H7704><s%> which <S%H834><s%> Jacob <S%H3290><s%> had bought <S%H7069><s%> from the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Hamor <S%H2544><s%> the father of Shechem <S%H1><s%> for one hundred <S%H7927><s%> pieces <S%H3967><s%> of money; <S%H7192><s%> and they became <S%H7192><s%> the inheritance <S%H1961><s%> of Joseph's sons. <S%H5159><s%>

And Eleazar <S%H499><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Aaron <S%H175><s%> died; <S%H4191><s%> and they buried <S%H6912><s%> him at Gibeah <S%H1390><s%> of Phinehas <S%H6372><s%> his son, <S%H1121><s%> which <S%H834><s%> was given <S%H5414><s%> him in the hill <S%H2022><s%> country <S%H2022><s%> of Ephraim. <S%H669><s%>
